title: Governance Proposal Schema
description: Defines a governance proposal for namespaces and clusters.

proposer.description: DID of the entity submitting the proposal.

namespace.description: DID of the namespace affected (if applicable).

cluster.description: DID of the cluster affected (if applicable).

details.description: A description of the proposal, including motivations and expected impact.

linkedResources.description: References to supporting documents or governance rules.
